definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: It also promoted the World Expo 2010 at the World Expo in Aichi , Japan.
sentences.chinese: 它也促進了在日本愛知縣世博會2010年世博會。

sentences.english: The theme of Shanghai World Expo is closely linked with that of Aichi World Expo.
sentences.chinese: 愛知和上海世界博覽會主題銜接緊密。

sentences.english: Remember the one in Aichi, Japan?
sentences.chinese: 諸位還記得起日本愛知世博會嗎？

sentences.english: I am a man, living in Aichi Pref, Japan.
sentences.chinese: 我是日本人，在日本的愛知。

sentences.english: Toyohashi City, Aichi Prefecture, Japan TFM Choir Guest Conductor.
sentences.chinese: 日本國愛知縣豐橋市TFM合唱團客席指揮。

sentences.english: The recent Registered International Exhibition is Expo 2005 Aichi Japan .
sentences.chinese: 最近一次註冊類世博會是2005年日本愛知世博會。

sentences.english: Japan's aichi world expo is the theme of "natural wisdom".
sentences.chinese: 日本愛知舉行的世博會的主題是“自然的睿智”。

definition: Hyōgo prefecture in the midwest of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]
Miyagi prefecture in the north of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]
to complete a course of study (old)/to graduate
